code:
// src/services/api.js
import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:4000';const register=(username,password)=>{return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/register"),{username,password});};const login=(username,password)=>{return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/login"),{username,password});};const addTodo=(description,status)=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/todos"),{description,status},{headers:{'x-access-token':token}});};const getTodos=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/todos"),{headers:{'x-access-token':token}});};const updateTodo=(id,description,status)=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/todos/").concat(id),{description,status},{headers:{'x-access-token':token}});};const deleteTodo=id=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/todos/").concat(id),{headers:{'x-access-token':token}});};export default{register,login,addTodo,getTodos,updateTodo,deleteTodo};
